subtitleNullable: Rock Paper Scissors hand gestures already annotated
descriptionNullable:
Are you passionate about hand gesture recognition and eager to develop a model capable of classifying the classic "rock, paper, scissors" signs? Look no further! We've got the perfect data set to fuel your project and help you take it to the next level.

Our data set is a compilation of YOLO-annotated images that have been carefully selected to cover a diverse range of hand shapes, sizes, orientations, and skin tones. We've also made sure to include images taken under different lighting conditions and against various backgrounds to ensure your model can perform well in real-world scenarios.

This enthusiast's data set is designed to be both accessible and comprehensive, providing a solid foundation for training and testing your hand gesture recognition algorithms. Whether you're just starting out in machine learning or you're an experienced developer, this data set will support your endeavors in creating an accurate and robust classifier for rock, paper, and scissors hand signs.

We encourage you to dive into this exciting data set, and we can't wait to see the innovative models that emerge from your hard work and dedication. Happy coding!
